channel.title: Whonix forum threads broken without JavaScript
channel.description:
Whonix forum threads are no longer visible when browsing on TBB (version: 10.0.16) with "security level" set to safest and javascript.enabled = False. Only thing you see is a blank page with header and footer showing.
I understand sign-up requires JavaScript but viewing threads was always possible with JavaScript disabled.
Forum redirect seem to point to forums.whonix.org page even when browsing the hidden service.

item.title: Whonix forum threads broken without JavaScript
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Works for me.

Could you compare please with upstream…?
